about_the_game: Skolly's Adventure is a small, single-player adventure game, in which you play as Skolly, a skeleton adventurer and treasure hunter ! travel the world on your flying boat, explore various strange environments, solve puzzles and collect all the shiny things !
detailed_description: Skolly's Adventure is a small, single-player adventure game, in which you play as Skolly, a skeleton adventurer and treasure hunter ! travel the world on your flying boat, explore various strange environments, solve puzzles and collect all the shiny things !
name: Skolly's Adventure Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore a sky filled with floating islands as Skolly, an unusual adventurer in search of all the hidden treasures of this forgotten world.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
